thread.title: President of Alacrity Collections Corporation Named to Maryland Collection Agency Licensing Board
thread.title_full: President of Alacrity Collections Corporation Named to Maryland Collection Agency Licensing Board

author: Susan Hayes
title: President of Alacrity Collections Corporation Named to Maryland Collection Agency Licensing Board
text:
Alacrity Collections Corporation announced today that Susan Hayes, the company’s founder and president, has been appointed by Governor Larry Hogan to serve a fifth consecutive term on the Maryland Collection Agency Licensing Board. "As a member of the Maryland Collection Agency Licensing Board, my mission is to ensure the highest level of compliance and ethics,” said Hayes. “It has been my privilege to protect and serve Maryland residents from abusive debt collection practices since 1997."
Hayes first launched Alacrity Collections Corporation in 1982. Under her leadership, the company has become the pre-eminent collections agency in the Maryland area. The company boasts a flawless record of compliance and has successfully recovered millions of dollars for its clients.
For more information about Alacrity Collections Corporation, visit http://www.alacritycollections.com .
